title: DiCaprio at his best!
review: This is a really great film with an amazing story about a clever young man (Leonardo DiCaprio, who is a really good actor) and his enemy (Tom Hanks).DiCaprio plays a young man who enjoys spending other people's money, while Hanks plays an FBI agent, who wants to track him down.Actually, they became friends at the end of this story. It starts with the 17 year-old running away from his parents after he thought his life was impossible and suddenly he finds himself taking different jobs and different names, earning and spending fortunes around the world. You must see it!
